means: [女子名] 巴特卡普来源于古英语，含义是“毛莨”(buttercup)

sentence.Network_en: Are you too proud to kiss me? the morning light asks buttercup.
sentence.Network_cn: 晨光问毛茛道: 你是骄傲得不肯和我接吻 么 ?

sentence.Network_en: The buttercup is a wild plant with bright yellow cup - shaped flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 毛茛是一种野生植物,开杯形黄色花.

sentence.Network_en: BUTTERCUP: ( catching her breath ) I was giving you a chance.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴特卡普: ( 气喘吁吁地 ) 我在给你机会.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 毛毛 (Buttercup) 　　“飞天小女警”中最好战的一个， 黑色的短发，绿色的眼睛，穿着绿色的裙子。她不像其他小女警，本身极度男子气。

entry.tran: 毛茛（开亮黄色花朵的小型植物）
entry.def: A buttercup is a small plant with bright yellow flowers.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various plants of the genus Ranunculus

sentences.en: The fields were golden with buttercups.
sentences.cn: 田里是一片金黄色的金凤花。
